remarks: The image of a convergent sequence under a continuous map is convergent to the image of the original point.  Binary operation version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2016.)
statement:

limccnp2.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` <. C , D >. ) ) $.
limccnp2 $p |- ( ph -> ( C H D ) e. ( ( x e. A |-> ( R H S ) ) limCC B ) ) $.
